donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Strengthened policies and regulatory frameworks and stakeholders capacity on governance aspects related to sustainable management of natural resources at national and target subnational levels that guarantee the rights of local and adat communities.

project_descr: The participatory governance assessment (PGA) for REDD+ implementation in Indonesia
project_title: The participatory governance assessment for REDD+
